definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: If Saturn be in Aquarius, he will be a mere woman-hater.
sentences.chinese: 如果土星位於水瓶座，盤主會很討厭女性。

sentences.english: On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑陰影投影在夜晚一側的土星環上。

sentences.english: On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑陰影投影在夜晚一側的土星環上。

sentences.english: Saturn's newest addition could explain how Cassini Regio came to be.
sentences.chinese: 土星的最新成員可以解釋卡西尼雷吉奧出現。

sentences.english: If we want to "get somewhere" in life, this is Saturn talking.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們想到達生命中的某處，這便是土星在發話。

sentences.english: What's happened to that moon of Saturn?
sentences.chinese: 土星的這顆衛星發生了什麼？

sentences.english: With no enhancement, the rings would be essentially invisible in this mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有增強，土星環基本上是不能在組圖上看到的。

sentences.english: Every time Saturn moves through a house we learn a lesson pertaining to that house.
sentences.chinese: 每當土星走完一宮，我們便可以藉此學到點什麼。

sentences.english: It is very powerful to sublimate the malefic effects of Saturn .
sentences.chinese: 這是非常強大的昇華土星的邪惡的影響。

sentences.english: Virgo is an earth sign, putting Saturn's focus on what's here and now.
sentences.chinese: 室女座是地球的跡象，使土星的重點是在這裏和現在。

sentences.english: Astrologically, I observe that Saturn is in Leo.
sentences.chinese: 從占星學角度來說，我觀察到土星的位子處於獅子座。

sentences.english: Mercury and Saturn readily fit within the same binocular field.
sentences.chinese: 在同一個雙眼領域內和土星欣然合適的水星。

sentences.english: Saturn is about hard work and discipline to achieve goals.
sentences.chinese: 土星是代表爲實現目標而努力工作和律己。

sentences.english: Saturn, which can act as a handbrake at times, is now moving forward in your sign.
sentences.chinese: 土星有時就像手剎一樣，現在正在你的星座前行。

sentences.english: In a personal relationship, Saturn in the third can also give difficulty with relatives.
sentences.chinese: 在個人關係裏面，土星第三宮也會爲相處帶來困難。

sentences.english: I say that because Saturn will be comfortingly close and helpful.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣說是因爲土星將有着密切的，有益的令人鼓舞。

definition: Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers

the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
gold star/stars (that one sees from blow to the head etc)
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座
Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
